options.saveValidator: function(formData) {if (!formData.use_failover_search_head || formData.use_failover_search_head === '0') { return true; } if (!formData.failover_search_head_address) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head host'; } if (!formData.failover_search_head_port) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head port'; } if(!formData.failover_search_head_username) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head user'; } if(!formData.failover_search_head_password) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head password'; } return true;}

options.saveValidator: function(formData) {if (!formData.use_failover_search_head || formData.use_failover_search_head === '0') { return true; } if (!formData.failover_search_head_address) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head host'; } if (!formData.failover_search_head_port) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head port'; } if(!formData.failover_search_head_username) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head user'; } if(!formData.failover_search_head_password) { return 'You have chosen to use a failover search head. Please specify failover search head password'; } return true;}
